sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from salesLT.CustomerAddress where ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('LookupMaxLastModifiedDate').output.firstRow.LastModifiedDate}' and ModifiedDate > '@{variables('lastModifiedDate')}'
select * from [SalesLT].[Customer] WHERE ModifiedDate BETWEEN '@{pipeline().parameters.startDate}' and '@{pipeline().parameters.EndDate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) AS recordCount from SalesLt.Product
